title: Exact decomposition of non-Markovian dynamics in open quantum systems
authors: Mariia Ivanchenkoa, Peter L. Walters, Fei Wang
abstract:
In this work, we developed a rigorous procedure for mapping the exact
non-Markovian propagator to the generalized Lindblad form. It allows us to
extract the negative decay rate that is the indicator of the non-Markovian
effect. As a consequence, we can investigate the influence of the non-Markovian
bath on the system's properties such as coherence and equilibrium state
distribution. The understanding of the non-Markovian contribution to the
dynamical process points to the possibility of leveraging non-Markovianity for
quantum control.
